# Contributing

## Overview

This file provides a pointer to the contribution guidelines. The canonical
contributing guide is maintained at the repository root.

## Location

The full contributing guide is available at:

- [CONTRIBUTING.md](../../CONTRIBUTING.md)

## Quick Reference

### Getting Started

1. Fork and clone the repository.
2. Follow the [Development Setup](../06_engineering/01_setup.md) guide.
3. Create a feature branch from `develop`.

### Making Changes

1. Write code following the [Coding Standards](../06_engineering/02_coding_standards.md).
2. Add tests as described in the [Testing Guide](../06_engineering/03_testing.md).
3. Follow the [Git Workflow](../06_engineering/04_git_workflow.md).

### Submitting a Pull Request

1. Push your branch and open a Pull Request.
2. Fill in the PR template with a description and test plan.
3. Wait for CI checks to pass and request a review.
